name: Raining Fire
description:
I hope you like are little survival game, if you want  please tell us what you think . 

There is 3 of us, BattleZays, Riptide and Potato_Dev   

.AKA. WonderingPotato64 

There is no winning to this game

its all about how long you can survive

and how many kills you can get

if you want to know who did what:

BattleZays did most of the coding

Potato_Dev did almost all the art 

And Riptide did music and helped with coding and art

YouTube Links:

Potato_dev https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbMb1Wa1sRUdp--0M6U048Q

Riptide https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvky8XpDVE4XhNlkTrKSDkA

BattleZayshttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmOgcNVN3aCNiwqktfo24nw?view_as=subscriber

Controls

A and D to move left and right

Spacebar to jump

Left mouse button to shoot

R to Restart
